New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest-ever Germany goal, breaking the previous record of 9 seconds held by Lukas Podolski
Key Match Events: Kai Havertz scored in the 49th minute to make it 2-0 for Germany
Antonio Rüdiger produced a late goalline clearance
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos returned to international retirement for the upcoming European Championship
Germany were looking to raise hopes for Euro 2024
Post-Match Reflections: The German national team and hopes were raised that they can excel on home ground at Euro 2024
France were whistled derisively by the home fans at full time
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stuttgart’s Maximilian Mittelstädt started at left-back on his debut and Bayer Leverkusen’s Robert Andrich also impressed in just his second cap
Others: Austria’s Christoph Baumgartner scored six seconds into a 2-0 friendly win over Slovakia earlier on Saturday
Kylian Mbappé had the best opportunity in a one-on-one but was denied by Marc-André ter Stegen
